movie.title: Melancholic
movie.description_intro: Kazuhiko, a graduate of a prestigious university, wasn't enjoying his life, until he takes a job at a bathhouse. Then he discovers that the baths are used as a space for killing people after closing hours.
movie.description_full: Kazuhiko, a graduate of a prestigious university, wasn't enjoying his life, until he takes a job at a bathhouse. Then he discovers that the baths are used as a space for killing people after closing hours.

movies.title: Red Billabong
movies.summary: In the Australian Outback, two brothers discover old secrets and family lies. As their friends start to go missing they fear they are being stalked by someone or something from their worst nightmares - But is it just - A story? A legend? A hoax? Or is it real?
movies.description_full: In the Australian Outback, two brothers discover old secrets and family lies. As their friends start to go missing they fear they are being stalked by someone or something from their worst nightmares - But is it just - A story? A legend? A hoax? Or is it real?

movies.title: Chilsu and Mansu
movies.summary: A painter quits his job and looks to an old acquaintance for work and a place to stay.
movies.description_full: A painter quits his job and looks to an old acquaintance for work and a place to stay.
movies.synopsis: A painter quits his job and looks to an old acquaintance for work and a place to stay.

movies.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
movies.title_english: David Brent: Life on the Road
movies.title_long: David Brent: Life on the Road (2016)
movies.summary: About 13 years on from his appearance in the documentary series The Office, a documentary film crew is once again following the life of David Brent. He is now working as a rep for cleaning goods distributor but still harbours dreams of making it big in the music business. Acting on this, he takes three weeks off work and tours with a new-look version of Foregone Conclusion, the band he was in in the 90s (he's the only remaining original member, for various reasons...).

movies.title: Think Like a Man
movies.summary: Four women have given up on getting their men to do what they want until they find a how to book
